price: (14) Say, "Allāh [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
